subject: Attention
body:
Attention 
 
 
Go and send a check or money order to this address right now we will catch the money on our own okay.
 
 
 
                                                       Receiver Name:
                                                     E. C.
                            ------------------------------------------
 
                                                      Mailing Address:
 
                                                      ozone park New York
                                        11420,United States of America
 
 
Send a copy of the check or money order you sent to this E-mail address immediately after you have sent the money.
 
 
your urgent response will be highly welcome.
 
Yours sincerely,
MR.ROBERT SMITH
payment director
For Supervisor Team

subject: Re:   Attention
body:
Hello SMITH,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in what you're saying, but could you please explain a bit more about why I need to send a check or money order? What is it for exactly? 

Also, could you tell me more about your role as a payment director and the Supervisor Team? It sounds fascinating!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Maryann
